blogPost.title: What is your best managing advice for running an engineering department? Answer by Raghavendra Prabhu (@omrvp), Head of Eng & Research @CovariantAI. https://t.co/vs9rXPS0S2 https://t.co/aFptxs0mzq
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: エンジニアリング部門を運営する上での最良のアドバイスは何ですか？Answer by Raghavendra Prabhu (@omrvp), Head of Eng & Research @CovariantAI. https://t.co/vs9rXPS0S2 https://t.co/aFptxs0mzq
您对管理工程部门的最佳管理建议是什么？回答者：Raghavendra Prabhu (@omrvp), Eng & Research负责人 @CovariantAI. https://t.co/vs9rXPS0S2 https://t.co/aFptxs0mzq
您對管理工程部門的最佳管理建議是什麼？回答者：Raghavendra Prabhu (@omrvp), Eng & Research負責人 @CovariantAI. https://t.co/vs9rXPS0S2 https://t.co/aFptxs0mzq

previous.title:
In @NewYorker, Cal Newport asks "Is going to the office a broken way of working?" After more than a year of being a remote-first company, we can certainly say it need not be the default. 
https://t.co/387UoU8qic

(p.s. we are hiring globally!) https://t.co/GilVOYVQwE https://t.co/o18QFdtZBe

localize.full_text:
在@NewYorker中，Cal Newport问道："去办公室是一种破碎的工作方式吗？" 经过一年多的远程第一的公司，我们当然可以说它不需要是默认的。
https://t.co/387UoU8qic

(p.s. we are hiring globally!) https://t.co/GilVOYVQwE https://t.co/o18QFdtZBe

在@NewYorker中，Cal Newport問道："去辦公室是一種破碎的工作方式嗎？" 經過一年多的遠程第一的公司，我們當然可以說它不需要是默認的。
https://t.co/387UoU8qic

(p.s. we are hiring globally!) https://t.co/GilVOYVQwE https://t.co/o18QFdtZBe

next.title: How can consumers protect themselves from scams or exploitation? Answer by @brian_dammeir, President of North America at @Adyen. https://t.co/XCI4orcOLy https://t.co/f9jtEFsNQM
